body.one: I'm Fernando Javier Batres Velásquez, a Guatemalan solutions architect with 10+ years building software for banking, healthtech, and enterprise teams.
body.two: I focus on backend and cloud platforms—NestJS, Angular, AWS, Azure—and I lead teams through microservices, event-driven designs, and CI/CD that ships safely.
body.three: Outside work, I'm a barista hobbyist, gamer, and deep researcher who loves exploring with my wife and our Newfoundland dog, Gaia.
body.four: I align architecture with business outcomes, shape engineering culture, and pair mentorship with hands-on delivery.
